languages.text: {n}Ханн упрямо вскидывает голову.{/n} "Это мои люди. Я за них отвечаю. Мы вместе пережили этот кошмар, и значит — сойдем с этого корабля все вместе. Или не сойдем вообще".
{n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."
languages.original_text: {n}Ханн упрямо вскидывает голову.{/n} "Это мои люди. Я за них отвечаю. Мы вместе пережили этот кошмар, и значит — сойдем с этого корабля все вместе. Или не сойдем вообще".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann tosses his head stubbornly.{/n} "These are my people. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship together, or none of us do."
{n}Hann tosses his head stubbornly.{/n} "These are my people. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship together, or none of us do."

{n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."
{n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

languages.text: {n}ハンは強く歯を食いしばった。{/n}「彼らは私の大切な仲間たちです。共にこの悪夢を乗り越えてきました…私は彼らを導く責任がある。全員この船から脱出することがかなわないのであれば、誰も降りません」
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンは強く歯を食いしばった。{/n}「彼らは私の大切な仲間たちです。共にこの悪夢を乗り越えてきました…私は彼らを導く責任がある。全員この船から脱出することがかなわないのであれば、誰も降りません」

languages.text: {n}汉恩扬起了下巴。{/n}“他们都是我的人，我们一起经历了这场噩梦，我必须对他们负责。要么我们一起离开这艘船，要么全都留在这里。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩扬起了下巴。{/n}“他们都是我的人，我们一起经历了这场噩梦，我必须对他们负责。要么我们一起离开这艘船，要么全都留在这里。”

languages.text: {n}Hann levanta la barbilla bruscamente.{/n} «Esta es mi gente. Hemos sobrevivido juntos a esta pesadilla y soy responsable de sus vidas. O salimos todos de la nave o no salimos ninguno».
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann levanta la barbilla bruscamente.{/n} «Esta es mi gente. Hemos sobrevivido juntos a esta pesadilla y soy responsable de sus vidas. O salimos todos de la nave o no salimos ninguno».

languages.text: {n}Hann lève le menton.{/n} « C'est de mes camarades que vous parlez. Nous avons traversé ce cauchemar ensemble et je suis responsable de leur sort. Soit nous quittons ce vaisseau ensemble, soit nous y restons tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann lève le menton.{/n} « C'est de mes camarades que vous parlez. Nous avons traversé ce cauchemar ensemble et je suis responsable de leur sort. Soit nous quittons ce vaisseau ensemble, soit nous y restons tous. »

languages.text: {n}Hann reckt sein Kinn nach oben.{/n} "Das sind meine Leute. Wir haben diesen Albtraum gemeinsam durchgestanden. Ich bin für sie verantwortlich. Wir verlassen alle dieses Schiff, oder niemand von uns geht."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann reckt sein Kinn nach oben.{/n} "Das sind meine Leute. Wir haben diesen Albtraum gemeinsam durchgestanden. Ich bin für sie verantwortlich. Wir verlassen alle dieses Schiff, oder niemand von uns geht."

languages.text: {n}Hann çenesini dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Bu insanlar benimle. Bu kâbusu hep beraber yaşadık. Onlardan ben sorumluyum. Ya bu gemiden hepimiz gideriz ya da hiçbirimiz gitmeyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann jerks his chin up.{/n} "These are my people. We lived through this nightmare together. I am responsible for them. All of us leave this ship, or none of us do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann çenesini dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Bu insanlar benimle. Bu kâbusu hep beraber yaşadık. Onlardan ben sorumluyum. Ya bu gemiden hepimiz ayrılırız ya da hiçbirimiz ayrılmayız."
